exports.EncoderBuffer: function o(t,e){if(Array.isArray(t))this.length=0,this.value=t.map(function(t){return!o.isEncoderBuffer(t)&&(t=new o(t,e)),this.length+=t.length,t},this);else if("number"==typeof t){if(!(0<=t&&t<=255))return e.error("non-byte EncoderBuffer value");this.value=t,this.length=1}else if("string"==typeof t)this.value=t,this.length=i.byteLength(t);else{if(!i.isBuffer(t))return e.error("Unsupported type: "+typeof t);this.value=t,this.length=t.length}}
